mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_no AS memNo, m.mem_id AS memId, m.mem_name AS memName, m.mem_status AS memStatus, m.mem_date AS memDate, m.ban_reason AS banReason, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board b WHERE b.mem_no = m.mem_no) AS postCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments c WHERE c.mem_no = m.mem_no) AS commentCount FROM member m ORDER BY m.mem_date DESC
